entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
